users.email_already_exists: A user with this email already exists
users.password_min_length: Password must be at least 12 characters long

users.impersonate_user_message_1: You will temporarily act as user {user} and have their permissions.
users.impersonate_user_message_2: To return to your account, click the close icon on the impersonation badge in the top bar.
users.impersonation_expired_message: The impersonation session has expired, you are now logged in as yourself.
users.impersonation_timer_tooltip: The impersonation session will end automatically in {timer}
users.you_are_now_logged_in_as_yourself: You are now logged in as yourself
users.reset_password_confirmation: Reset the password for user {name}? This will update the user's sign-in information.
users.password_reset_description: The password for user {name} has been reset
users.phone_already_exists: A user with this phone number already exists
users.credentials_updated_description: The credentials for user {name} have been updated
users.user_email_description: The user will receive a welcome email containing instructions on how to access {productName}, along with a temporary password that can be changed upon first login.

account.title: Account settings
account.cannot_edit_profile_owner_description: You cannot edit your profile because you are logged in as the 'owner' user.
account.cannot_edit_profile_impersonating_descri: You cannot edit the profile because you are impersonating another user.
account.password_change_disabled_owner_descripti: You cannot change your password because you are logged in as the 'owner' user.
account.password_change_disabled_impersonating_d: You cannot change the password because you are impersonating another user.
account.new_password_min_length: New password must be at least 12 characters long
account.new_password_missing_uppercase: New password must contain at least one uppercase letter
account.new_password_missing_lowercase: New password must contain at least one lowercase letter
account.new_password_missing_digit: New password must contain at least one digit
account.new_password_missing_special_char: New password must contain at least one special character
account.new_password_too_many_repeating_chars: New password contains too many repeating characters
account.new_password_must_be_different_from_curr: New password must be different from current password
account.change_your_temporary_password_descripti: You can find your current password in the email sent when your account was created. This helps protect your account's security.
account.password_changed_description: Your password has been changed successfully

impersonation.impersonation_description: Impersonation allows users with role @:user_roles.super_admin to temporarily take on your identity and permissions. This can be useful for resolving technical issues or providing support. For security reasons, impersonation sessions always have a limited duration.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_enabled_descriptio: Users with role @:user_roles.super_admin can now impersonate your account for {hours} hour. | Users with role @:user_roles.super_admin can now impersonate your account for {hours} hours.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_is_enabled_until_t: Impersonation consent will remain enabled until {time}
impersonation.impersonation_consent_disabled_descripti: Users with role @:user_roles.super_admin will no longer be able to impersonate your account.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_cant_be_modified_o: You cannot edit impersonation consent because you are logged in as the 'owner' user.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_cant_be_modified_i: You cannot edit impersonation consent because you are impersonating another user.
impersonation.enable_impersonation_modal_message: By enabling impersonation consent, you allow users with @:user_roles.super_admin role to impersonate your account for the specified time interval. This action can be revoked at any time.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_duration_integer: The duration for impersonation consent must be an integer.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_duration_minimum: The minimum duration for impersonation consent is 1 hour.
impersonation.impersonation_consent_duration_maximum: The maximum duration for impersonation consent is 168 hours (7 days).
impersonation.sessions_description: Overview of all sessions during which you were impersonated by a user with @:user_roles.super_admin role.
impersonation.no_sessions_description: You have not been impersonated yet.

systems.system_secret_copied_description: Go to the Subscription page of {name} and paste the secret to complete the subscription.
systems.choose_product_to_view_versions: Choose a product to view available versions
